language.heading: Choose your language
language.description: This will be the language in which your app will be displayed, and can be changed at any time from the More Section of the application.

polling_stations.heading: Monitor polling stations
polling_stations.description: and document in real-time the entire election process, on forms which your accrediting NGO has set up

forms.heading: Fill in observation forms
forms.description: and track their progress during each monitoring stage

media.heading: Add notes or media files
media.description: if you notice any problems to further support your answers

disclaimer.paragraph1: Please note that if you are not accredited as an independent observer by an organization that monitors election processes in your country, you cannot use the Vote Monitor app.
disclaimer.paragraph2: Please refer to such organizations to learn what steps you need to take to become an electoral observer or contact us for further information at

login.heading: Log in
login.paragraph: Please use the email address with which you registered as an independent observer:

errors.invalid_credentials: There was an error with your credentials. Please try again.
errors.offline: You need an internet connection in order to log in.

login.email_toast: Email address was copied to clipboard

forgot_password.heading: Forgot your password?
forgot_password.paragraph: Please enter the email address associated with your account and weâ€™ll send you a link to reset your password.

errors.invalid_email: The current email is not registered in the system. Please try again.

confirmation.heading: Email sent
confirmation.paragraph: Check your email and open the link we sent to continue. Check your spam filter if you did not receive the email.

about_app.title: About Vote Monitor
about_app.general: Vote Monitor is a dedicated digital tool for independent observers and international organizations engaged in election monitoring. Vote Monitor is developed and managed by Code for Romania/Commit Global.
about_app.purpose: The app assists independent observers in monitoring polling stations and documenting the polling process in real-time for a specific election round. All data collected through the mobile app is sent in real-time to accrediting organizations to identify potential red flags that may indicate fraud or other irregularities. Ultimately, our goal is to provide a clear, simple, and realistic snapshot of the polling process proceedings.

app_provides.item1: A way to manage multiple visited polling stations
app_provides.item2: An efficient method to monitor the flow of the polling process through forms set up by accrediting organizations
app_provides.item3: A means of quickly reporting other problematic issues outside the standard forms

about_app.usage: The Vote Monitor App can be used during any type of election in any country worldwide. Since 2016, it has been used in multiple election rounds in Romania and Poland.

loading_screen.heading: Loading...
loading_screen.paragraph: We are preparing all the data, please wait!

no_election_round.heading: No election event to observe yet
no_election_round.paragraph: You will be able to use the app once you will be assigned to an election event by your organization

no_visited_polling_stations.heading: No visited polling stations yet
no_visited_polling_stations.paragraph: Start configuring your first polling station before completing observation forms.

my_polling_stations.heading: My polling stations
my_polling_stations.paragraph: You can switch between polling stations if you want to revisit form answers or polling station information.

error.arrival_first: Please select an arrival time first.
error.later_departure: Please select a departure time that is at a later time than the arrival.
error.earlier_arrival: Please select an arrival time that is at an earlier time than the departure.
error.server: We couldn't send the information to the server.

polling_station_form.paragraph: Answer a few quick questions about the polling station.

list.empty: Observation forms will appear here once your organization will publish them in the system.

error.paragraph2: We could not fetch the data. Press the retry button to try again!

select_language_modal.helper: The selected form is available in multiple languages. Please select which one you would like to continue with.
select_language_modal.error: Please select one of the options

warning_modal.title: Clear Polling station information form
warning_modal.description: This action will delete all answers entered so far for this form. To avoid unintended information loss, please ensure you check the form before performing this action.

unsaved_changes_dialog.title: Save changes to form
unsaved_changes_dialog.description: You have unsaved changes on this form. Do you want to save your changes before leaving?

form_overview.error: Error while loading the form data!

description.p1: This action will delete all answers entered so far for this form (including notes and media files). Status of all questions will be reverted to 'Not Answered'.
description.p2: To avoid unintended information loss, please ensure you check the form before performing this action

form.min: The field must be at least {{value}} characters long
form.max: The field must have a maximum of {{value}} characters

input.placeholder: Add any relevant notes to this question.

delete.title: Delete note
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. Once deleted, a note cannot be retrieved.

question.title: Clear answer to question {{value}}
question.description: Clearing the answer to this question will permanently delete all its information (including notes and media files), as well as all its connected questions. Question statuses will be reverted to Not Answered.

attachment.title: Delete media file
attachment.description: This action cannot be undone. Once deleted, a media file cannot be retrieved.

unsaved_answer.title: Save changes to question
unsaved_answer.description: You have unsaved changes on this question. Do you want to save your changes before leaving?

warning_dialog.title: Remove Polling station #{{value}}
warning_dialog.description: This action will remove the polling station from your list of visited polling stations. You can add it again through the Add New Polling Station process.

removal_unallowed_dialog.title: Removing polling station #{{value}} not allowed
removal_unallowed_dialog.description: The polling station cannot be removed from your list because it contains data (Polling station information and/or Form answers) which cannot be deleted by the system on your behalf. If you want to remove this polling station, please clear polling station information and form answers manually, then retry this action.

manage_my_polling_stations.delete_error: We encountered a problem while deleting the polling station visit. Please try again.
manage_my_polling_stations.offline_error_toast_msg: You need an internet connection in order to perform this action.

list.title: Quick Report
list.heading: My reported issues
list.empty: Start sending quick reports to the organization if you notice irregularities inside, outside the polling station or whenever needed.

polling_station_id.label: Polling station *
polling_station_id.extra: Please write here some identification details for this polling station (such as address, name, number, etc.)

options.not_related: Not related to a polling station

polling_station_details.label: Polling station details *
polling_station_details.placeholder: Please write here some identification details for this polling station (such as address, name, number, etc.)

issue_title.label: Title of issue *
issue_title.placeholder: Write a title for the issue.
issue_title.required: Title of the issue is required

issue_description.label: Description *
issue_description.placeholder: Describe the situation in detail here.
issue_description.required: Description of the issue is required

empty.heading: No guides to read yet
empty.paragraph: Guides and resources from your organization at your hands.

empty.heading: No message received yet
empty.paragraph: Push messages and alerts from your organization will appear here.

logout_offline.title: Attention: You have unsynced data
logout_offline.description:
You are currently offline. If you log out now, any forms, attachments, or notes you have completed or uploaded during the offline mode will be lost.

To avoid losing your data, please reconnect to the internet before logging out.

logout_online.title: Are you sure you want to logout?

feedback_toast.offline: You need an internet connection in order to perform this action.

feedback_sheet.heading: Send us your feedback
feedback_sheet.p1: Please tell us about any issues you might have encountered with the functioning of the app, or any suggestions you would like to share to improve Vote Monitor for the future. We appreciate every feedback!

confirmation.heading: Password changed!
confirmation.paragraph: Your password has been successfully changed.

error.offline: App is offline and cannot do the request

generic_error_screen.paragraph2: We could not recover after this error. Please check your internet connection and restart the application!

network_banner.online: App online. All answers sent to server.
network_banner.offline_warning: It looks like you're currently offline. Don't worry, your answers are safely stored locally and will be synced with our servers once your connection is restored. Feel free to continue filling out the observation forms and submitting quick reports.

sync.warning: Please DO NOT CLOSE the app or the internet connection or the data will be lost.
sync.files: We are uploading your files, it may take a while...
